text: John Kompara (April 12, 1936 – April 21, 2014) was an American football defensive tackle. He played for the Los Angeles Chargers in 1960. He died on April 21, 2014, in Clermont, Florida at age 78. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American football defensive tackles Category:South Carolina Gamecocks football players Category:Los Angeles Chargers players
title: John Kompara
